ssot__ContactPointPhone__dlm.name: Contact Point Phone
ssot__ContactPointPhone__dlm.description: The Contact Point Phone DMO represents the phone number of a party.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the phone number is active.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the phone number is inactive.

ssot__BestTimeToContactEndTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to stop receiving calls.

ssot__BestTimeToContactStartTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to start receiving calls.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezone__c.description: The preferred timezone for the contact

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact’s preferred time zone.

ssot__CityName__c.description: The city related to the phone number.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the contact point phone DMO.

ssot__ContactPointTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of phone number, for example business or personal.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: A reference ID for the country related to the phone number.

ssot__CountryName__c.description: The country related to the phone number.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system’s logical name that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record originated, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceId__c.description: A unique ID of the device where the phone number is associated.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__ForBusinessUse__c.description: An indicator if the phone number is used for business use.

ssot__ForPersonalUse__c.description: An indicator if the phone number is used for personal use.

ssot__FormattedE164Phonenumber__c.description: The number that is formatted according to e164 formatting, for example, +165012345678.

ssot__FormattedInternationalPhonenumber_.description: The number that is formatted according to international formatting, for example, +16 501-234-5678.

ssot__FormattedNationalPhonenumber__c.description: The number that is formatted according to 3123 formatting, for example, 501 234 5678.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID for the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: Whether the phone number is active.

ssot__IsFaxCapable__c.description: Whether the phone number can receive a fax.

ssot__IsSMSCapable__c.description: Whether the phone number can send and receive SMS messages.

ssot__IsUndeliverable__c.description: Whether the phone number isn’t working.

ssot_IsVerified__c.description: Indicates whether the phone number is verified.

ssot__IsVoiceCapable__c.description: Whether the phone number is voice over internet protocol (VOIP) capable.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID for the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID for the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PhoneCountryCode__c.description: The phone number’s country code, for example, +1.

ssot__PreferenceRankNumber__c.description: The preference rank number for the contact point phone.

ssot__PrimaryFlag__c.description: Whether a phone number is the primary number of the individual or account.

ssot__PrimaryPhoneTypeId__c.description: The type of phone number, for example home, business, or fax.

ssot__ProfileLastUpdatedDate__c.description: The date the profile was last updated.

ssot__ProfileOccurrenceCount__c.description: The number of occurrences of the profile for the contact point address.

ssot__ShortCode__c.description: A number assigned to SMS and MMS messages.

ssot__TimezoneCode__c.description: A single-character code indicating the time zone’s relationship to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

ssot__UsageType__c.description: The usage type for the contact point email.
